chunks.chunk_text: John, where's your brother?How about going to movie?Sure, the music was great.I like jogging, hiking and dancing.I still have ten more minutes to play.Excuse me, is this seat taken?歡迎收聽齊彬老師的超級英語通Welcome to English All Pass with Kenneth Chee
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Hello everyone, welcome to News English All Pass.My name is Kenneth Chee,歡迎收聽新聞英語通。我是齊彬老師。In this unit, we'll be learning about news. 這個單元,我們要來學習的是新聞英語。So first, let's listen to today's news. 首先,我們來聽一下今天的新聞。

chunks.chunk_text: up the day.However, keep an eye on the forecast, a scattered rain showers are likely to develop later in the afternoon and continuing to the evening.While these showers are not expected to be heavy, having an umbrella on hand is a good idea for outdoor activities.Winds will remain light and variable throughout the day, and overnight temperatures will dip down to around 50 degrees.

chunks.chunk_text: Cleveland's weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting the variability of the Great Lakes region.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: A mix of conditions is a combination of weather conditions.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: The Great Lakes 這個就是五大湖區的英語說法。接著做進一步的說明。The morning started off cool and crisp, with temperatures around 52 degrees Fahrenheit. 早上涼爽宜人,氣溫約52華氏度。Start off 片語 開始 Crisp 形容詞指的是天氣乾冷的或涼爽的。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: As the day unfolds, 隨著一天的展開,預計氣溫將逐漸變暖,下午最高溫度將達65華氏度。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Trend 名詞 趨勢從 with 開始到最後的 afternoon 這整個是附帶狀況的用法。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Skies will be partly cloudy, allowing periods of sunshine to brighten up the day. 天空部分多雲,會有短暫陽光照耀的時刻。Partly cloudy 就是部分多雲,晴時多雲。Allowing 到最後的 day 這個是一個分詞構句。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Keep an eye on the forecast, as scattered rain showers are likely to develop later in the afternoon and continue into the evening. 不過仍請留意氣象預報。
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Scattered rain showers 指的就是零星陣雨。Be likely to 這個句型就是很可能的意思。While these showers are not expected to be heavy, having an umbrella on hand is a good idea for outdoor activities.
chunks.original_filename: RSS_1567737523_podcast_1304_一天10分鐘 新聞英語通Clevelands weather today brings a mix of conditions reflecting t.json

chunks.chunk_text: Have something on hand 片語指的是在手邊有什麼。Winds will remain light and variable throughout the day, and overnight temperature will dip down to around 50 degrees Fahrenheit. 整天風都不大而且多變,夜間氣溫將降至50華氏度左右。Variable 形容詞多變的。Dip down to 片語。

chunks.chunk_text: 多變的、反覆無常的Overnight 形容詞一夜間的Dip down to 片語下降到OK, that's all for this unit 最後請記得每日十分鐘讓您變成英語通我是奇兵老師Until then, see you next time!
